summary: This document is a letter from an unnamed sender to Deutsche Bank, authorizing Darren Indyke to have signing authority and verbal confirmation on accounts related to a financial relationship. The letter includes contact information and mentions verification of account details.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is granted signing authority and verbal confirmation authority on accounts associated with the financial relationship mentioned in the letter.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is addressed in the letter as the contact at Deutsche Bank for the authorization request.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The letter authorizes Darren Indyke to have signing authority on accounts.
The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
The document includes a request for verbal confirmation authority on the accounts.
There are indications of account verification processes mentioned in the letter.
The document is marked as confidential.
